mapper.insert: INSERT INTO workout_session (user_id, title, start_time, total_volume) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{startTime}, #{totalVolume})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM workout_session WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND end_time IS NULL ORDER BY start_time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT SUM(s.weight * s.reps) FROM workout_set s JOIN workout_activity a ON s.activity_id = a.id WHERE a.session_id = #{sessionId}
